pilots.name: Han Solo
pilots.caption: The Corellian Kid
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, you may roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Lando Calrissian
pilots.caption: Smooth-talking Gambler
pilots.ability: After you roll dice, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to reroll all of your blank results.

pilots.name: L3-37
pilots.caption: Droid Revolutionary
pilots.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

pilots.name: Freighter Captain
pilots.text: Many spacers make a living traveling the Outer Rim, where the difference between smuggler and legitimate merchant is often murky. On the outskirts of civilization, buyers are rarely so discerning to ask where merchandise came from, at least as long as the price is low enough.

pilots.name: Outer Rim Pioneer

shipAbility.name: Co-Pilot
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

pilots.caption: Skillful Outlaw
pilots.ability: Friendly ships at range 0-1 can perform attacks at range 0 of obstacles.

pilots.name: L3-37

shipAbility.name: Co-Pilot
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

pilots.caption: Droid Revolutionary
pilots.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

pilots.name: Lando Calrissian

shipAbility.name: Co-Pilot
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

pilots.caption: Smooth-talking Gambler
pilots.ability: After you roll dice, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to reroll all of your blank results.

pilots.name: Autopilot Drone
pilots.text: Sometimes, manufacturer's warnings are made to be broken.

shipAbility.name: Rigged Energy Cells
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, if you are not docked, lose 1 [Charge]. At the end of the Activation Phase, if you have 0 [Charge], you are destroyed. Before you are removed, each ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

pilots.caption: Set to Blow

pilots.name: Moralo Eval
pilots.caption: Criminal Mastermind
pilots.ability: If you would flee, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of the edge of the play area that you fled from.

pilots.name: Latts Razzi
pilots.caption: Martial Artist
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a ship at range 1 and spend a lock you have on that ship. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Trandoshan Slaver
pilots.text: The spacious triple-decker design of the YV-666 makes it popular among bounty hunters and slavers, who often retrofit an entire deck for prisoner transport.

pilots.name: Bossk
pilots.caption: Fearsome Hunter
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, after the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 [Critical Hit] result to add 2 [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Trandoshan Slaver
pilots.text: The spacious triple-decker design of the YV-666 makes it popular among bounty hunters and slavers, who often retrofit an entire deck for prisoner transport.

pilots.name: Nashtah Pup

shipAbility.name: Escape Craft
shipAbility.text: Setup: Requires the Hound's Tooth. You must begin the game docked with the Hound's Tooth.

pilots.caption: Contingency Plan
pilots.ability: You can deploy only via emergency deployment, and you have the name, initiative, pilot ability, and ship [Charge] of the friendly, destroyed Hound's Tooth.

pilots.name: Nashtah Pup

pilots.caption: Contingency Plan

pilots.name: N’dru Suhlak
pilots.caption: Hunt Saboteur
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: N’dru Suhlak
pilots.caption: Hunt Saboteur
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Black Sun Soldier
pilots.text: The vast and influential Black Sun crime syndicate can always find a use for talented pilots, provided they aren't particular about how they earn their credits.

pilots.name: Black Sun Soldier

pilots.name: Kaa’to Leeachos
pilots.caption: Imposing Marauder
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

pilots.name: Kaa’to Leeachos
pilots.caption: Imposing Marauder
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

pilots.name: Binayre Pirate
pilots.text: Operating from the Double Worlds, Talus and Tralus, Kath Scarlet's gang of smugglers and pirates would never be described as reputable or dependable—even by other criminals.

pilots.name: Binayre Pirate
pilots.text: Operating from the Double Worlds, Talus and Tralus, Kath Scarlet's gang of smugglers and pirates would never be described as reputable or dependable—even by other criminals.

pilots.name: Bossk

shipAbility.name: Pursuit Craft
shipAbility.text: After you deploy, you may acquire a lock on a ship the friendly Hound's Tooth has locked.

pilots.caption: Fearsome Hunter
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, after the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 [Critical Hit] result to add 2 [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Boba Fett
pilots.caption: Notorious Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at range 0-1.

pilots.name: Kath Scarlet
pilots.caption: Captain of the Binayre Pirates
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 friendly non-limited ship at range 0 of the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Krassis Trelix
pilots.caption: Imperial Deserter
pilots.ability: You can perform [Front Arc] special attacks from your [Rear Arc]. While you perform a special attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.

pilots.name: Emon Azzameen
pilots.caption: Shipping Magnate
pilots.ability: If you would drop a device using a [1 [Straight]] template, you may use the [3 [Turn Left]], [3 [Straight]], or [3 [Turn Right]] template instead.

pilots.name: Koshka Frost
pilots.caption: Icy Professional
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is stressed, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

pilots.name: Bounty Hunter
pilots.text: The Firespray-class patrol craft is infamous for its association with the deadly bounty hunters Jango Fett and Boba Fett, who packed their craft with countless deadly armaments.

pilots.name: Fenn Rau

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Skull Leader
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1, you may roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Kad Solus

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Skilled Commando
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 2 focus tokens.

pilots.name: Zealous Recruit
pilots.text: Mandalorian Fang fighter pilots must master the Concordia Faceoff maneuver, leveraging their ships' narrow attack profile to execute deadly head-on charges.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Joy Rekkoff

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Skull Squadron Ace
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] from an equipped [Torpedo] upgrade. If you do, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

pilots.name: Old Teroch

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Mandalorian Mentor
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1. If you do and you are in its [Front Arc], it removes all of its green tokens.

pilots.name: Skull Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The aces of Skull Squadron favor an aggressive approach, using their craft's pivot wing technology to achieve unmatched agility in the pursuit of their quarry.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Skull Squadron Pilot

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Mandalorian Royal Guard

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Selfless Protector
pilots.ability: While a friendly non-small ship defends, if you are in the attack arc, you may gain 1 deplete and 1 strain token. If you do, the defender may change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Mandalorian Royal Guard

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Selfless Protector
pilots.ability: While a friendly non-small ship defends, if you are in the attack arc, you may gain 1 deplete and 1 strain token. If you do, the defender may change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Ketsu Onyo
pilots.caption: Black Sun Contractor
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in both your [Front Arc] and [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-1. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Sabine Wren
pilots.caption: Artistic Saboteur
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is in your [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-2, you may add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Asajj Ventress
pilots.caption: Force of Her Own
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token unless it removes 1 green token.

pilots.name: Shadowport Hunter
pilots.text: Crime syndicates augment the lethal skills of their loyal contractors with the best technology available, like the fast and formidable Lancer-class pursuit craft.

pilots.name: Talonbane Cobra
pilots.caption: Scourge of Tansarii Point
pilots.ability: While you defend at attack range 3 or perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Viktor Hel
pilots.caption: Storied Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: After you defend, if you did not roll exactly 2 defense dice, the attacker gains 1 stress token.

pilots.name: Graz
pilots.caption: The Hunter
pilots.ability: While you defend, if you are behind the attacker, roll 1 additional defense die. While you perform an attack, if you are behind the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Black Sun Ace
pilots.text: The Kihraxz assault fighter was developed specifically for the Black Sun crime syndicate, whose highly paid ace pilots demanded a nimble, powerful ship to match their skills.

pilots.name: Captain Jostero
pilots.caption: Aggressive Opportunist
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship suffers damage, if it is not defending, you may perform a bonus attack against that ship.

pilots.name: Cartel Marauder
pilots.text: The versatile Kihraxz was modeled after Incom's popular X-wing starfighter, but an array of after-market modification kits ensure a wide variety of designs.

pilots.name: Kavil
pilots.caption: Callous Corsair
pilots.ability: While you perform a non-[Front Arc] attack, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Hired Gun
pilots.text: Just the mention of Imperial credits can bring a host of less-than-trustworthy individuals to your side.

pilots.name: Drea Renthal
pilots.caption: Pirate Lord
pilots.ability: While a friendly non-limited ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

pilots.name: Crymorah Goon
pilots.text: Though far from nimble, the Y-wing's heavy hull, substantial shielding, and turret-mounted cannons make it an excellent patrol craft.

pilots.name: Dace Bonearm
pilots.caption: Outer Rim Mercenary
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship at range 0-3 receives at least 1 ion token, you may spend 3 [Charge]. If you do, that ship gains 2 additional ion tokens.

pilots.name: Palob Godalhi
pilots.caption: Tethan Resister
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your firing arc at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

pilots.name: Torkil Mux
pilots.caption: Mercenary Miner
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, that ship engages at initiative 0 instead of its normal initiative value this round.

pilots.name: Spice Runner
pilots.text: Though its cargo space is limited compared to other light freighters, the small, swift HWK-290 is a favorite choice of smugglers who specialize in discreetly transporting precious goods.

pilots.name: Spice Runner
pilots.text: Though its cargo space is limited compared to other light freighters, the small, swift HWK-290 is a favorite choice of smugglers who specialize in discreetly transporting precious goods.

pilots.name: Constable Zuvio

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

pilots.caption: Missing Sheriff of Niima Outpost
pilots.ability: If you would drop a device, you may launch it using a [1 [Straight]] template instead.

pilots.name: Jakku Gunrunner
pilots.text: The Quadrijet transfer spacetug, commonly called a “Quadjumper,” is nimble in space and atmosphere alike, making it popular among both smugglers and explorers.

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

pilots.caption: Miserly Portion Master
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there are one or more other ships at range 0, you and each other ship at range 0 gain 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Sarco Plank

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

pilots.caption: The Scavenger
pilots.ability: While you defend, you may treat your agility value as equal to the speed of the maneuver you executed this round.

pilots.name: Prince Xizor

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

pilots.caption: Black Sun Kingpin
pilots.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, another friendly ship at range 0-1 and in the attack arc may suffer 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] damage. If it does, cancel 1 matching result.

pilots.name: Black Sun Enforcer
pilots.text: Prince Xizor himself collaborated with MandalMotors to design the StarViper-class attack platform, one of the most formidable starfighters in the galaxy.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

pilots.name: Dalan Oberos

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

pilots.caption: Elite Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 stress token to rotate your ship 90°.

pilots.name: Black Sun Assassin
pilots.text: Although assassinations can be handled with a shot in the dark or a dire substance added to a drink, a flaming shuttle tumbling from the sky sends a special kind of message.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may reroll 1 of its dice.

pilots.name: Genesis Red

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint

pilots.caption: Tansarii Point Crime Lord
pilots.ability: After you acquire a lock, you must remove all of your focus and evade tokens. Then, gain the same number of focus and evade tokens that the locked ship has.

shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

pilots.caption: Fortune Seeker
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 [Charge] on 1 of your equipped upgrades.

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint

pilots.caption: Car’das Enforcer
pilots.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, if the attack missed, gain 1 evade token.

pilots.name: Inaldra

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

pilots.caption: Tansarii Point Boss
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to reroll any number of your dice.

pilots.name: Tansarii Point Veteran
pilots.text: The defeat of Black Sun ace Talonbane Cobra by Car'das smugglers turned the tide of the Battle of Tansarii Point Station. Survivors of the clash are respected throughout the sector.

pilots.name: Sunny Bounder

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

pilots.caption: Incurable Optimist
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, after you roll or reroll your dice, if you have the same result on each of your dice, you may add 1 matching result.

pilots.name: Cartel Spacer
pilots.text: MandalMotors' M3-A “Scyk” Interceptor is purchased in large quantities by the Hutt Cartel and the Car'das smugglers due to its low cost and customizability.

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

pilots.name: G4R-G0R V/M

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

pilots.caption: Tilted Droid
pilots.ability: After you defend, each other ship at range 0 suffers 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

pilots.name: Tel Trevura
pilots.caption: Escape Artist
pilots.ability: If you would be destroyed, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, discard all of your damage cards, suffer 5 [Hit] damage, and place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of your player edge.

pilots.name: Contracted Scout
pilots.text: Built for long-distance reconnaissance and plotting new standard routes, the lightly armed JumpMaster 5000 is often extensively retrofitted with custom upgrades.

pilots.name: Contracted Scout
pilots.text: Built for long-distance reconnaissance and plotting new standard routes, the lightly armed JumpMaster 5000 is often extensively retrofitted with custom upgrades.

pilots.name: Dengar
pilots.caption: Vengeful Corellian
pilots.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your [Front Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

pilots.name: Manaroo
pilots.caption: Graceful Aruzan
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer all green tokens assigned to you to that ship.

pilots.name: Nom Lumb
pilots.caption: On the Run
pilots.ability: After you become the defender, if the attacker is not in your [Single Turret Arc], you must rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator to a standard arc the attacker is in.

pilots.name: 4-LOM
pilots.caption: Reprogrammed Protocol Droid
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 1 calculate token. At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer 1 of your stress tokens to that ship.

pilots.name: Zuckuss
pilots.caption: Meditative Gand
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Gand Findsman
pilots.text: The legendary Findsmen of Gand worship the enshrouding mists of their home planet, using signs, augurs, and mystical rituals to track their quarry.

pilots.name: Torani Kulda

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.caption: Rodian Freelancer
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, each enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] suffers 1 [Hit] damage unless it removes 1 green token.

pilots.name: Dalan Oberos

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.caption: Returned from the Grave
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 shielded ship in your [Bullseye Arc] and spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship loses 1 shield and you recover 1 shield.

pilots.name: Cartel Executioner
pilots.text: Many veteran pilots in the service of the Hutt kajidics and other criminal operations choose the M12-L Kimogila for its firepower and dreaded reputation alike.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.name: Captain Nym
pilots.caption: Captain of the Lok Revenants
pilots.ability: Before a friendly bomb or mine would detonate, you may spend 1 [Charge] to prevent it from detonating. While you defend against an attack obstructed by a bomb or mine, roll 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Sol Sixxa
pilots.caption: Cunning Commander
pilots.ability: If you would drop a device using a [1 [Straight]] template, you may drop it using any other speed 1 template instead.

pilots.name: Lok Revenant
pilots.text: The Nubian Design Collective crafted the Scurrg H-6 Bomber with combat versatility in mind, arming it with powerful shields and a bristling array of destructive weaponry.

pilots.name: IG-88A

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.caption: Aggressive Automaton
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship with [Calculate] on its action bar at range 1-3. If you do, transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to it.

pilots.name: IG-88D

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.caption: Deadly Device
pilots.ability: While you execute a Segnor's Loop ([Segnor's Loop Left] or [Segnor's Loop Right]) maneuver, you may use another template of the same speed instead: either the turn ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) of the same direction or the straight ([Straight]) template.

pilots.name: IG-88B

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.caption: Brutal Battledroid
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that misses, you may perform a bonus [Cannon] attack.

pilots.name: IG-88C

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.caption: Conniving Contraption
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Boost] action, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Mining Guild Surveyor
pilots.text: With Imperial construction projects consuming raw materials at an unprecedented rate, the Mining Guild ruthlessly exploits newly discovered deposits of doonium ore on worlds such as Batonn, Lothal, and Umbara.

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.name: Overseer Yushyn

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.caption: Overbearing Boss
pilots.ability: Before a friendly ship at range 1 would gain a disarm token, if that ship is not stressed, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token instead.

pilots.name: Captain Seevor

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.caption: Noisy Nuisance
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, before attack dice are rolled, if you are not in the enemy ship's [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the enemy ship gains 1 jam token.

pilots.name: Ahhav

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.caption: Vengeful Survivor
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is a larger size than you, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Foreman Proach

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.caption: Slave Driver
pilots.ability: Before you engage, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 1-2 and gain 1 disarm token. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Foreman Proach

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.caption: Slave Driver
pilots.ability: Before you engage, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 1-2 and gain 1 disarm token. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Mining Guild Sentry
pilots.text: As part of its arrangement with the Empire, the Mining Guild receives modified TIE/ln Fighters to protect its operations. These craft have solar panels removed from their stabilizers for improved visibility, and feature more extensive life support systems for the benefit of their corporate pilots.

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

pilots.name: Lawless Pirates
pilots.text: The Separatist Alliance has close ties with certain mercenaries and criminal groups and, as the war rages on, its technology sometimes finds its way into unsavory hands.

shipAbility.name: Tractor Grasp
shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Lawless Pirates
pilots.text: The Separatist Alliance has close ties with certain mercenaries and criminal groups and, as the war rages on, its technology sometimes finds its way into unsavory hands.

shipAbility.name: Tractor Grasp
shipAbility.text: After you perform a Tractor Tentacles attack that hits, the defender gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Syndicate Smugglers
pilots.text: Vessels like the C-ROC Cruiser allow criminal operations across the Outer Rim to move massive amounts of illicit materials, or project power that can bully small colonies into compliance.

shipAbility.name: Overdrive Burners
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if your revealed maneuver is speed 3-5, roll 1 additional defense die.
